sections.instructor: Zeigler, Katie, Prerequisite: College-level composition (ENGL C1000/ ENGL C1000H/ ENGL C1000E/C-ID ENGL 100) or equivalent Note: 100% online course - no scheduled meetings.  Instruction will be provided through the college learning management system CANVAS.  On the course start date, log into Canvas, www.dvc.edu/online to begin.

Burgess, Susan, Prerequisite: College-level composition (ENGL C1000/ ENGL C1000H/ ENGL C1000E/C-ID ENGL 100) or equivalent Note: Partially online course with required on-campus meetings on the San Ramon Campus Mondays 12:45-2:10PM  (see room on schedule) with all other  instruction provided online through the college learning management system Canvas. On the course start date, log into Canvas, www.dvc.edu/online, to locate course.

Wilson, James, Prerequisite: College-level composition (ENGL C1000/ ENGL C1000H/ ENGL C1000E/C-ID ENGL 100) or equivalent Note: This section is part of the Community of Pride learning community, a community designed for queer and trans students and allies. Students are encouraged to also enroll in one additional course: PSYCH 122-5352. To join either or both courses in the learning community, email charrington@dvc.edu Note: Class meets on campus as scheduled.
